alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 12:32PM EDT until July 25 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Sullivan County in central New York... Northeastern Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1232 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glen Spey, or 9 miles northwest of Port Jervis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shohola, Highland Lake, Millrift, Glen Spey, Mongaup Valley Wildlife Area, Twin Lakes, Forestburgh and Barryville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
